class.name: OScriptNodeCompose
class.deprecated: This node is no longer available.
class.brief_description: Compose a [Variant] type based on it's defined constructor arguments.
class.description: This node creates the specified [Variant] type based on it's constructor arguments. [b]Deprecated:[/b] This node is now deprecated, and replaced by the [OScriptNodeComposeFrom] node. [i]This node is scheduled for removal in a future build of Orchestrator.[/i]
